programme.title: Live Premier League
programme.desc: West Ham United v Chelsea (Kick-off 12.30pm). Coverage of the top-flight clash, which takes place at London Stadium. The Hammers have made a dreadful start to the campaign, with manager Slaven Bilic paying the price for his side's poor form and being replaced by former Everton and Manchester United boss David Moyes. The Scotsman will be hoping for a morale-boosting victory here over the champions, whose own form has picked up recently after a slight dip

programme.title: Live Nissan Super Sunday
programme.desc: Manchester United v Manchester City (Kick-off 4.30pm). Coverage of the Manchester Derby, which takes place at Old Trafford. Pep Guardiola's Citizens have earned plaudits across the country for their style of football this season, which has seen them hold top spot in the Premier League for most of the campaign so far. Jose Mourinho's Red Devils have played a more attritional brand of football, but a win here will see them keep in touch with their neighbours in the title race

programme.desc: Reading v Cardiff City (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the Championship clash, which takes place at the Madejski Stadium. The home side have struggled to match their play-off form from last season this time around, and are currently languishing at the bottom end of the table. By comparison, Neil Warnock's Bluebirds are among the main promotion contenders, and will be looking to improve their chances of gaining a place in the Premier League with a win here(n)

Evroliga - 11. Round: Olympiacos - Real Madrid
programme.desc: Luka Dončić bo Real tokrat popeljal v vroči Pirej, kjer ga čaka Olympiacos. Grki so ob CSKA-ju letos pokazali največ in bodo tudi srečanje proti kraljevemu klubu začeli v vlogi rahlega favorita. Pri Realu tudi tokrat največ pričakujejo od Dončića, ki jih zagotovo ne bo razočaral

programme.title: Spanish league: Alaves - Las Palmas
programme.desc: Španska nogometna liga, bolj poznana pod vzdevkom La Liga, je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje v Španiji. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1929. V ligi nastopa 20 klubov, kjer vsako sezono nekdo postane prvak in izpade v špansko drugo ligo. Najuspešnejša kluba sta madridski Real in Barcelona. Skupaj sta ligo osvojila kar 56-krat. Zadnji naslov je romal v roke madridskega Reala

programme.title: Italijanska liga (m): Grotte - Sora
programme.desc: Lega Pallavolo Serie A je najprestižnejše ligaško odbojkarsko tekmovanje v Italiji. V njej nastopa 13 ekip. Aktualni državni prvaki so odbojkarji Modene. Lega Palavolo Serie A velja za najboljšo odbojkarsko ligo na svetu

programme.title: Champions League - 6. Round: Real Madrid - Borussia (D)
programme.desc: Borussia je letos v ligi prvakov razočarala svoje navijače in si bo šele v zadnjem krogu poskušala zagotoviti tretje mesto in nadaljevanje evropske sezone v evropski ligi. Real na drugi strani še išče šampionsko formo in bo proti Nemcem zaigral na vso moč, da se svojim navijačem vsaj nekoliko odkupi za nekatere spodrsljaje v uvodnem delu sezone

programme.title: Evroliga - 11. Round: Barcelona - Fenerbahce
programme.desc: Barcelona še vedno išče povratek na zmagovita pota, Fenerbahče pa po lanski izjemni sezoni tudi letos igra odlično in bo več kot očitno vnovič med glavnimi favoriti za končno slavje. Bi Katalonci s pomočjo svojih navijačev lahko zaustavili ekipo Željka Obradovića in pred nadaljevanjem sezone dobili prepotrebno dozo samozavesti?

V njej vsako leto sodeluje 18 klubov, vendar le pet je takšnih, ki so jo od leta 1934 (datum ustanovitve) tudi osvojili. Kar 81 od skupnih 83 naslovov je osvojila t.i. velika trojica (Benfica, Sporting in Porto) preostala dva naslova pa sta romala v roke Belenensesa in Boaviste. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Benfice

programme.title: Spanish league: Deportivo – Leganes
programme.desc: Španska nogometna liga, bolj poznana pod vzdevkom La Liga, je najelitnejše nogometno tekmovanje v Španiji. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1929. V ligi nastopa 20 klubov, kjer vsako sezono nekdo postane prvak in izpade v špansko drugo ligo. Najuspešnejša kluba sta madridski Real in Barcelona. Skupaj sta ligo osvojila kar 56-krat. Zadnji naslov je romal v roke madridskega Reala

programme.title: NBA: LA Clippers - Washington
programme.desc: Liga NBA velja za najboljše košarkarsko tekmovanje na svetu, v katerem se merijo najboljši košarkarji. V ligi, ki je bila ustanovljena 6. junija 1946 v New Yorku, nastopa 30 ekip, ena od teh je kanadska. S 17 naslovi za najuspešnejšo ekipo tekmovanja v zgodovini velja Boston Celtics, v zadnjem letu pa so naslov osvojili košarkarji Golden Stata, ki so bili v finalu močnejši od Clevelanda LeBrona Jamesa

programme.title: Live! Serbian League: Napredak - Partizan
programme.desc: Partizan si v lovu na Crveno zvezdo novega spodrsljaja ne sme privoščiti, v nasprotnem primeru bi rdeče-beli lahko ušli na neulovljivo prednost. Napredak je pred koncem jesenskega dela v sredini lestvice in si zagotovo želi še višje, zato bo tudi Partizan poskušal presenetiti in gostom iz prestolnice zagreniti življenje

programme.desc: Številne zanimive zgodbe iz zakulisja najmočnejše košarkarske lige na svetu - NBA

programme.title: Live! Serbian League: Crvena zvezda - Borac
programme.desc: Crvena zvezda je v zadnjem krogu remizirala z Bačko, a Partizan tega ni znal izkoristiti, tako da imajo rdeče-beli še naprej šest točk prednosti. Na Marakano tokrat prihaja Borac, ki ga čaka boj za obstanek, zato lahko pričakujemo, da bodo gostje naredili vse, da se dokopljejo vsaj do točke

programme.title: Spanish league: Betis - Atletico Madrid
programme.desc: Atletico Madrid je očitno le našel strelsko formo, saj je na zadnjih obračunih zelo dejaven pred nasprotnikovimi vrati. Ekipa Jana Oblaka bo tudi proti Realu iz Betisa v vlogi favorita, a rezultati domačih v letošnji sezoni so zelo solidno, tako da četo Diega Simeoneja čaka vse prej kot lahka pot do novih treh točk

programme.title: Ukrajinska liga: Oleksandrija – Dinamo Kijev
programme.desc: Ukrajinska Premier liga je najmočnejše ligaško nogometno tekmovanje v Ukrajini. Ustanovljena je bila leta 1992 po razpadu Sovjetske zveze. V njej nastopa 14 klubov. Daleč najuspešnejša kluba sta Dinamo Kijev in Shakhtar Donjetsk, ki sta skupaj osvojila kar 25 naslovov državnih prvakov. Ukrajinska Premier liga je 7. najmočnejša liga v Evropi (po lestvici UEFE)(n)

programme.title: Avstrijska liga: Wolfsberger – Salzburg
programme.desc: Avstrijska Bundesliga je najvišje rangirano ligaško nogometno tekmovanje v Avstriji. Ustanovljena je bila daljnega leta 1911. V njej nastopa 10 klubov, ki med seboj odločajo o naslovu državnega prvaka. Daleč najuspešnejši klub je Rapid, ki je osvojil kar 32 naslovov, sledi mu Austria, ki jih je v svoje vitrine pospravila 24. Aktualni prvaki so nogometaši Salzburga(n)

programme.title: Spanish league: Real Madrid - Sevilla

programme.desc: Part 1. Fred and Conway wrap up the season with a trip to Alaska. Salmon, halibut, rockfish and bear all come out to play as Ninilchik Outfitters give the guys a taste of the Last Frontier

programme.title: Hollywood Hunter
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Hunter's Best of Deer Hunt Highlights
programme.desc: Get ready for action-packed deer hunts as we bring to you the best of highlights with the Hollywood Hunter and friends. It's all about the experience, camaraderie and excitement of the hunt

programme.title: Brotherhood Outdoors
programme.desc: Ronnie Carver shares his history as a proud member of his local auto workers union. He discusses his passion for forestry and tours his certified family forest. When he heads to Canada to experience a bear hunt, he fulfills a family dream

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: Montana is an extremely game-rich environment, but on this early season archery antelope hunt, Melissa Bachman finds herself in the perfect location on her biggest antelope to date

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: It's the peak of the season and Kristy Cook is competing for a mule deer on a self-guided hunt through the treacherous terrain of Western Hell's Canyon

programme.title: Red Rising
programme.desc: Jason Bowers is trying to kill another buck in Iowa for the team. As he takes it to the wire, will he kill, or will he have nothing to show for at sundown

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: ConQuest Scents travels to the ATA show and releases their new Heat Seeker product to the public. After ATA, they head home to the farm and start building a new addition to the main facility

programme.title: All Things Hunting - ATH
programme.desc: Kyle and Cole are bowhunting on the ATH lease in central Texas where they have multiple encounters with a deer they have named Donkey. They finally draw blood, but not quite enough, at least until rifle season rolls around

programme.title: Big Boys TV
programme.desc: Jada is on her very first aoudad hunt in New Mexico, which isn't easy

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: Hoping to hit the peak rut just right, Mike and friends head to Alabama for one last hunt in late January

programme.title: North American Whitetail Television
programme.desc: Pat Hogan takes advantage of a cold front during his Ohio bowhunt; Dr. James Kroll discusses cold-weather feeding patterns for bucks; and Stan Potts talks treestand setups

programme.title: In-Fisherman
programme.desc: It's all about select lures and sleight of hand, as the staff tinkers with rubberskirted jigs for largemouths and shows how to sweet-swim finesse jigs for smallmouths

programme.title: Bowhunter TV
programme.desc: Bowhunter returns to Greenland's southern fjordlands to hunt muskox with well-known outfitter Frank Feldmann. Bowhunter publisher Jeff Waring and friends get their first look at this amazing land and stalk into point blank range of big, woolly bulls

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Part 1. Join Craig Boddington and Steve Hornady on a bucket list safari in Uganda. Tag along as they hunt Nile buffalo, track plains game across the long-grass savannah and fish the headwaters of the mighty Nile on this epic adventure

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.desc: Subsonic and high-velocity ammo is drawing more attention due in part to suppressed and unsuppressed firearms. Our experts compare velocities and decibel levels. A totally new semi-auto pistol is all the rage as we get a first look at the Spectrum

programme.title: On The Road With Rock & Aaron
programme.desc: Rock kicks back with the family doing a little hunting and mudding at his high-fence ranch at River Run, Texas, while Aaron hunts for whitetail in Ohio

programme.title: Small Town Hunting
programme.desc: Cody, Chris and Keith are rocking and rolling in west Texas chasing turkeys

programme.title: Down South
programme.desc: Justin heads to the Alabama woods to bag a few gobblers

programme.title: Trained Assassins
programme.desc: Cragg Fitz and Jay Alston head north to the Kingdom Ranch in Missouri to try to fill their second buck tags before the season closes. They still have plenty of bucks on the hit list, and just enough time to try to finish out the season with a bang(n)

programme.title: Backwoods Life
programme.desc: Michael Lee is hunting in Texas at New Ranch Outfitters with good friends, Matt McCluney and Brendon Shiver. The rut is over and huge bucks are patternable again around food sources(n)

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: David and Jeff head back to southwest Kansas to hunt the gun opener. David puts the spot-and-stalk on an old whitetail warrior, and Jeff pulls the trigger on another old Kansas whitetail after 20 days of hunting(n)

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: Years after unceremoniously firing Pigman, the guys from Elusive Wildlife come crawling back. As a peace offering, they give Pigman free range to hunt on their property day and night, and it looks like this relationship is built for the long haul(n)

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Part 1. Join Craig Boddington and Steve Hornady on a bucket list safari in Uganda. Tag along as they hunt Nile buffalo, track plains game across the long-grass savannah and fish the headwaters of the mighty Nile on this epic adventure(n)

programme.title: McMillan
programme.desc: Graig Hale from the Sportsman Channel arrives and meets his newest friend, Gutshot the Decoy. Following the evolution of Gutshot, we learn that creativity and resourcefulness are often the best recipes for success(n)

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: After an unsuccessful early-season hunt, Greg returns to South Dakota 30 days later with the hopes of a little better luck(n)

programme.title: Trailing the Hunter's Moon
programme.desc: Blake Barnett and Larry Weishuhn are in far west Texas helping Greg Smons to remove a few coyotes on his mule deer property to increase the fawn survival rate(n)

programme.title: Fresh Tracks With Randy Newberg
programme.desc: Tim Lesser joins Randy Newberg for another week, but this time they are chasing New Mexico elk in a large wilderness burn. Getting to them and packing one out are huge challenges(n)

programme.title: Pigman: The Series
programme.desc: Years after unceremoniously firing Pigman, the guys from Elusive Wildlife come crawling back. As a peace offering, they give Pigman free range to hunt on their property day and night, and it looks like this relationship is built for the long haul(n)

programme.title: Country Boys Outdoors
programme.desc: Down in Mexico with good friend and fellow hunter Bill Gorman, as well as a few of his boys from Indiana, Brad Miller is gunning for his first-ever Mexican mule deer. The hunt for the elusive Ciervo Mulo is trickier than it seems(n)

programme.title: Whitetail Slam
programme.desc: Hunters attempt to kill four deer from among eight whitetail sub-groups(n)

programme.title: Pure Hunting
programme.desc: Part 2. Willi hunted doves in Argentina last year and now heads back to fulfill a bucket list hunt: free-range red stag with a bow. His wife, Sherry, and friends, Jason Matzinger and Cassandra, are coming along for the hunt, food and adventure(n)

programme.title: Wild Outdoors
programme.desc: Last spring, The Wild Outdoors decided to film their turkey hunts live on Facebook. This show highlights the good and bad of that decision(n)

programme.title: RNT-V
programme.desc: Not every hunt is cupcakes and roses. There's times we have to deal with adverse conditions and have to play the hand your dealt. That's what this show is all about, making something out of nothing(n)

programme.title: Avian-X TV
programme.desc: On the way home, Fred stops by PTO in Kansas to visit Zach White. A large number of lesser Canada geese and specklebellies in the area quickly become the topic of discussion as Fred sees opportunity for one last stack to cap the 2016-17 season(n)

programme.title: The Honey Brake Experience
programme.desc: Marke Herron has been around the block. Watch as he schools the younger guides(n)

programme.title: Into High Country
programme.desc: Jason and his good friends, Barrett Haugan and Willi Schmidt, travel north to Alberta to hunt with Northern Edge Outfitting. After a few days of hunting the guys are able to take some great bears and Barrett takes his biggest bear ever(n)

programme.title: Backwoods Life
programme.desc: Michael Lee is hunting in Texas at New Ranch Outfitters with good friends, Matt McCluney and Brendon Shiver. The rut is over and huge bucks are patternable again around food sources(n)

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: David and Jeff head back to southwest Kansas to hunt the gun opener. David puts the spot-and-stalk on an old whitetail warrior, and Jeff pulls the trigger on another old Kansas whitetail after 20 days of hunting(n)

programme.title: Gallery of Guns
programme.desc: Dave Miles shows a lever-action from Mossberg: the 464 brush gun. Clay pigeons don't fly far against the Browning Sweet 16. We look at a concealed carry option from Diamondback: the DB9. Also: reviewing the Thompson/Center Venture 270(n)

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: Steve Makes the Team: Kentucky Small Game
programme.desc: Steven heads to Kentucky to hunt with Kevin Murphy and his army of hunting dogs(n)

programme.title: ConQuest 200
programme.desc: Doug goes in for surgery and hopes to head to Alaska with friends on a bear hunt. Attending the United Deer Farmers of Michigan Conference, Doug is encouraged by how big the event is for deer famers(n)

programme.title: Full Draw Adventures
programme.desc: Bill reflects back on his year at the Hunt Club, lessons learned and shares insight into what makes the most ideal whitetail habitat(n)

programme.title: The Lindsey Way
programme.desc: The family is in Iowa for late season after a giant named MVP. Mrs. Wanda Lindsey is up to bat and proves why she is the MVP of the family(n)

programme.title: Dominant Bucks
programme.desc: Learn the Dominant Buck tactics of North Carolina hunter Roy Smith. Join Roy as he demonstrates his do-it-yourself approach to successful capturing of a buck hunt on film(n)

programme.title: Red Rising
programme.desc: Danny Calloway is a deer-killing fool in Maryland. Watch Danny's season as he takes on the swamp ninjas of Maryland(n)

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: At 86-years-old, Sally Hubbard steals the show by taking her first mule deer(n)

programme.title: Buckventures' The Woodsman
programme.desc: Jeff Danker and Buddy Groom attempt to seize success during a warm, Ohio rut hunt(n)

programme.title: McMillan
programme.sub-title: The Man With the Golden BB Gun
programme.desc: Early bow season brings beautiful weather to the McMillan ranch. Tom takes advantage of these blue sky days to get some chores done, including roping and tagging some brand new calves. Gatlin and family also go on a coyote hunt(n)

programme.title: Sweetwater
programme.desc: Miles and Joey reflect on past visits to some of the best grass-fishing lakes in America(n)

programme.title: In-Fisherman
programme.desc: The staff is on a mission for monsters, as a trip for late-season smallmouths becomes a big-time, multi-species affair. The shallow scud waters of prairie country produce porker perch, and it takes obnoxiously big, bold lures for cold-water largemouths(n)

programme.title: The Western Hunter
programme.desc: Nate ends up on Kodiak Island on short notice to hunt Sitka blacktail deer with his friend, Wayne Endicott, after unforeseen circumstances left an open seat on Wayne's long-planned hunting trip(n)

programme.title: Pure Hunting
programme.desc: Will Schmidt heads to his property in Nebraska for a last-minute, self-filmed whitetail hunt. The area had been hit hard by EHD in previous years so he's hoping the quality of bucks has improved(n)

programme.title: Fresh Tracks With Randy Newberg
programme.sub-title: Don't Shoot an Elk Here! - Colorado Elk Misery
programme.desc: Randy shows why you should not shoot an elk in some places they live. Toasty November temps have bulls in deep, dark canyons. Randy is dumb enough to shoot one down there and pays the price for doing so(n)

programme.title: Petersen's Hunting Adventures
programme.desc: Part 1. Join Craig Boddington and Steve Hornady on a bucket list safari in Uganda. Tag along as they hunt Nile buffalo, track plains game across the long-grass savannah and fish the headwaters of the mighty Nile on this epic adventure(n)

programme.title: Long Range Pursuit
programme.desc: Aaron Davidson takes his twin boys, Derec and Danner, to experience the wonders of hunting in South Africa(n)

programme.title: MeatEater
programme.sub-title: A Trip of Firsts: Mexico Coues Deer and Javelina
programme.desc: Steven Rinella and Janis Putelis hunt Coues deer and javelina in Mexico(n)

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.desc: Kahr brings two new 9mm pistols to market and Magnum Research has a new suppressed rimfire rifle. Blackhawk has you covered from .22 rimfire to .338 Lapua when it comes to suppressors, and Hornady covers with home security(n)

programme.title: GunVenture
programme.desc: Ryan heads to the Gulf Coast to go on a monster hunt: shark fishing during the day and hog hunting at night. Along the way, he grabs an aerial view of the Florida coast, catches a really big ray and braves treacherous bridges looking for pigs(n)

programme.title: Small Town Hunting
programme.desc: Muzzleloader season is open in Iowa and that only means one thing: it is time to drop the hammer on the CVA(n)

programme.title: Adrenaline
programme.desc: Bowhunters Kyle Wieter and Linda Sanchez have struggled during the Illinois rut, but as Thanksgiving rolls in, this crew has a lot to be thankful for. The celebration begins when Ms. Linda brings her A-game and connects on her first deer(n)

programme.title: Whitetail Slam
programme.desc: Dr. James Kroll heads into the land of Palmetto bucks. Florida's seminole whitetail is a unique deer sub-species that ruts in July(n)

programme.title: Wildlifers
programme.desc: The Wildlifers are off to Kansas to fill their tags with big bucks. After years of hard work, the deer numbers are starting to come back to where they ought to be, but a run-in with an unwelcome guest could signal the beginning of a new threat(n)

programme.title: Extreme Outer Limits TV
programme.desc: Part 1. Bob Beck and the crew search for a bull worthy of the Oregon Governor's tag(n)

programme.title: Big Boys TV
programme.desc: Kevin, Jada and Austin hunt and do some guiding for turkeys in northern Michigan(n)

programme.title: The Most Wanted List
programme.desc: Charlie Blackmon is back for another epic hunt, but this time, he wants to catch a record-setter(n)

programme.title: Winchester Deadly Passion
programme.desc: The Nebraska Sandhills have become a favorite destination for Melissa Bachman when it comes to big mule deer. After a tough archery hunt earlier in the season, Bachman returns to do a self-filmed hunt that ends with a pretty incredible buck up close(n)
